entities.name: flobberworms
entities.description: Flobberworms are described as one of the most boring creatures in existence. They require care and attention from Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who expresses skepticism about caring for flobberworms.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry has to care for flobberworms and is occupied with Quidditch season.

entities.name: oliver wood
entities.description: Oliver Wood is the Captain of the Gryffindor team and calls a meeting to discuss Quidditch tactics.

relationships.description: Harry has to care for flobberworms.
Ron expresses skepticism about caring for flobberworms.
Oliver Wood is the Captain of the Gryffindor team.
